title: MediCore360 – Hospital Management System
description: A full-stack healthcare management solution integrating patient feedback, fleet, laundry, and maintenance modules. Developed with React and Python Flask to automate workflows and improve hospital efficiency.

title: ConstructEase – Construction Management Platform
description: A web-based application designed for construction teams to manage projects, workers, and analytics dashboards. Built with JavaScript, Node.js, and REST APIs for performance and scalability.

title: InsightFlow – Data Research and Analytics System
description: A startup-focused data science platform featuring automated ETL, visualization, and machine learning experiments. Developed using Python, Pandas, and scikit-learn.

title: AutoSys – System Automation Toolkit
description: A set of Python scripts and tools for automating server administration, deployment, and monitoring tasks across Linux environments.
